review: worked great for few months. Then, it got slow, it would heat up, then stops working. AND it was not my internet as everything else was working great. I have a very high speed internet. The Chromecast would get so hot, so it is a cheap product. You would be better off buying it from local place like walmart so you can at least get some credit if you want to return it. I would place this under DO NOT BUY !!
author: Burhan K.

review: Easy to set up. You just plug it into your TV and follow the steps. I bought the Chromecast because I use a lot of Netflix and YouTube and it works just fine. Also, it is compatible with a lot of devices (both Android and iOS). Highly recommended!
author: Nelson Briceño

review: Ordered this...quickly ordered firestick after. The streaming is aweful
author: Joanne C Lightcap

review: It's nice to watch on a bigger screen then the iPad, but it freezes a lot, and sometimes takes forever to connect to my netflix.
author: Kelly J Cullen

review: works like a charm thank you
author: blynch35

review: I got this mainly for the purpose of streaming Crunchyroll on my TV, and it works perfectly! It was very easy to set up and even easier to use.
author: George D.
